title: ihapara sukhadhayaka
sahitya:
ihapara sukhadAyaka varam tandaruL vaLLi nAyaka



anupallavi



guhapara sadguruvara SaNmukha parAtparA



caraNam



nIyE gatiyE krpAnidhiyE nal vAkkaruL purivAyE vAcaspati vAgpati nIyE
inrum en tAyE
sadbhakti bhAgyam tandaruLvAyE ghana dhanamOD saubhAgyam kavi kunjaradAsan
tanakku nIyE
